scripts.version-bump: git commit -am "Version bump to $(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version | cut -c 2-)"
scripts.document: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown src/index.ts --readme none --hideBreadcrumbs --excludePrivate && mv docs/README.md . && rm -r docs
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json --outdir ./cjs --module commonjs && printf '{"type":"commonjs"}' > ./cjs/package.json
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf esm && tsc -p tsconfig.json --outdir ./esm --module nodenext && printf '{"type":"module"}' > ./esm/package.json
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
